languages.text: [Атаковать корабль] "То есть сейчас "Обет Императора" без Лорд-капитана? Как удачно. Сначала я разберусь с вами, а потом проверю, что Винтерскейла постигла та же судьба".
languages.translation_comment:
Выход в ОЧЕНЬ СЛОЖНЫЙ космобой
Obsolete

traits.locale_text: [Атаковать корабль] "То есть сейчас "Обет Императора" без Лорд-капитана, а династия Винтерскейл без главы? Как удачно".

languages.text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."
languages.original_text: [Атаковать корабль] "То есть сейчас "Обет Императора" без Лорд-капитана? Как удачно. Сначала я разберусь с вами, а потом проверю, что Винтерскейла постигла та же судьба".

traits.locale_text: [Attack the ship] "What you are saying is Oath of the Emperor is missing the Lord Captain and the Winterscale dynasty its missing its head? How very fortunate."
[Attack the ship] "What you are saying is Oath of the Emperor is missing the Lord Captain and the Winterscale dynasty its missing its head? How very fortunate."
[Attack the ship] "What you are saying is Oath of the Emperor is missing its Lord Captain and the Winterscale dynasty its missing its head? How very fortunate."
[Attack the ship] "What you are saying is Oath of the Emperor is missing its Lord Captain and the Winterscale dynasty its missing its head? How very fortunate."

[Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

[Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

languages.text: [Attaquer le vaisseau] « Vous dites que le Serment de l'Empereur se retrouve sans seigneur-capitaine ? Quel heureux hasard. Je vais d'abord m'occuper de votre cas, après quoi je veillerai à ce que Winterscale connaisse le même sort. »
languages.original_text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

traits.locale_text: [Attaquer le vaisseau] « Vous dites que le Serment de l'Empereur se retrouve sans seigneur-capitaine ? Quel heureux hasard. Je vais d'abord m'occuper de votre cas, après quoi je veillerai à ce que Winterscale connaisse le même sort. »

languages.text: [攻击对方舰船]“你的意思是说，‘帝皇誓约号’的领主舰长目前不在船上？我还真是撞了大运。我先把你解决掉，在这之后，我会确保温特斯凯尔也落得同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

traits.locale_text: [攻击对方舰船]“你的意思是说，‘帝皇誓约号’的领主舰长目前不在船上？我还真是撞了大运。我先把你解决掉，在这之后，我会确保温特斯凯尔也落得同样的下场。”

languages.text: [Das Schiff angreifen] "Wollt Ihr damit sagen, dass dem Eid des Imperators der Lord Captain fehlt? Welch glückliche Fügung. Zuerst kümmere ich mich um Euch und dann werde ich dafür sorgen, dass Winterzunder dasselbe Schicksal ereilt."
languages.original_text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

traits.locale_text: [Das Schiff angreifen] "Ich verstehe das also richtig, die Eid des Imperators hat keinen Lord Captain und die Dynastie Winterzunder hat keinen Kopf? Welch glückliche Fügung."

languages.text: [Atacar la nave] «Entonces, ¿el Voto del Emperador no tiene a su Lord Capitán? Es una circunstancia fortuita. Primero acabaré con vosotros y luego me encargaré de que Winterscale comparta el mismo destino».
languages.original_text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

traits.locale_text: [Atacar la nave] «Entonces, ¿el Voto del Emperador no tiene a su Lord Capitán? Es una circunstancia fortuita. Primero acabaré con vosotros y luego me encargaré de que Winterscale comparta el mismo destino».

languages.text: [船を攻撃する]「つまり、『皇帝の誓い』号がロード・キャプテンを失ったということか？それは幸運だ。まずはお前を始末し、しかる後にウィンタースケールも同じ運命を辿らせてやろう」
languages.original_text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."

languages.text: [Gemiye saldır] "Lord Kaptan, İmparator'un Andı'nda değil mi yani? Çok yazık. Önce sizin icabınıza bakacağım, sonra da o Winterscale'in."
languages.original_text: [Attack the ship] "Do you mean to say that the Emperor's Vow is missing its Lord Captain? How very fortunate. First I shall deal with you, then I shall see to it that Winterscale meets the same fate."
